name: Dynamic QR Code URL Saver
author: Alexander Funk

sections.description:
The DQRS (DynamicQRSaver) generates a dynamic QR-Code. This QR-Code / the URL gets saved in the WordPress-Database and can be changed later on.
Simply edit the QR-Code URL in the Backend-Tab.

Arbitrary section

Visit the developer and designer of this awsome plugin at Funk.design
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation
1. Upload the zip-file with the wordpress plugininstaller.
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
3. Have fun
Optional: Share it with your firends

Manual Installation
1. Upload all files, of the archiv, to the wordpress Plugin directory
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
3. Have fun
Optional: Share it with your firends
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Fixed some MySQL-update bug’s
  • Edited the styles and some backend-inproofments

short_description: Generates a dynamic QR-Code, which can be saved and edited later, even if the QR Code was printed. Very easy to install and use. Share smartly!
